title: Wifi disabled
body:
Hey guys,
So for the past 2 months ( yeah I know its a long while but I've been busy with exams), my client got into trouble with connecting the game.
Whenever I run the game I always got disconnected in less than 5 mins and then my network just got disabled. I've tried to contact the customer service of  the manufacturer of my computer and I ran a diagnostic check, everything is fine including software and hardware.
Do any of you having the similar issue?

replies.body: Please go through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Support article and run through the troubleshooting steps. If those don't work, let me know and we can continue attempting to troubleshoot the issues.

Thanks for the reply.
I've tried to run troubleshooting and it worked for like maybe 2-3 hours then it happened again.
So eventually I solved this problem by using cable net, but this also happens to other games so I don't think it's leagues problem.

Cheers
